entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Whitby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle changing to a few flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating before morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
